com.atmecs.falcon.automation.ui.seleniuminterfaces

Interface ICheckBox

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CheckBox

    public interface ICheckBox
    Any Check box related action can be performed by the methods provided in this Interface.
    Author:
    aa092105

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ICheckBox.SelectType
      enum object for selection type(check or uncheck)

      • clickCheckBoxById

        boolean clickCheckBoxById(com.atmecs.falcon.automation.util.enums.LocatorType locator,
                          java.lang.String elementId,
                          ICheckBox.SelectType selectType)
        Purpose : This method is used to select the Check box using Id
        Parameters:
        locator - : is the ENUM type of the Identifier for a Web Element
        elementId - : is the value of the locator type
        selectType - : is the ENUM type of the Identifier for check box type(check/uncheck)
        Returns:
        : the boolean true if clicked or false if not
